review_title: Its a great NGO and I really love it
pros: they are very positive and having a great tolerance. Its really like a true family and nice environment
cons:
Not paying a good salary or a competitive salary.
Not providing training.
The coordination between HQ to Iraq office is poor, at least till now.
There is no staff motivation at all, I could say its zero.
It has a lot of gaps that HQ should pay attention to for the betterment
low pay salary comparing to other orgniztion
